actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title VIII of the National Housing Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to terminate the requirement for mortgage insurance premiums with respect to military family housing properties under the jurisdiction of the Department of Defense the mortgages of which are insured by the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to terminate the requirement for mortgage insurance premiums with respect to property under the jurisdiction of the Department of Defense.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VIII of the National Housing Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to terminate the requirement for mortgage insurance premiums with respect to military family housing properties under the jurisdiction of the Department of Defense the mortgages of which are insured by the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
